articles.description: Owners of the Samsung Galaxy S20 Ultra have complained about a bug that makes their displays assume a green tint when brightness is reduced. It also appears to be present on the regular S20 and S20+. Thankfully, though, Samsung has promised to fix it.
articles.content: Earlier this week, we revealed that some Samsung Galaxy S20 Ultra users were complaining about a green tint display issue on their phones after installing the latest update. The issue typically occurred when the phone's brightness was reduced, in any app that… [+651 chars]

articles.description: LG is teasing the name of its next new smartphone, the LG Velvet which focuses on its design over its spec sheet, just like previous reports claimed.
